text: Åge Nordkild (19 September 1951 - 28 December 2015) was a Norwegian Sámi politician. He was a member of the Norwegian Sami Association. He held many places in the Sami Parliament from 2001 to 2005 and 2009 to 2013. He was born in Narvik. Nordkild died on 28 December 2015 at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Norwegian politicians
title: Åge Nordkild
